definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The post-position word is a kind of function word in the modern Kazakh language.
sentences.chinese: 後置詞是現代哈薩克語虛詞的一種。

sentences.english: The author described its postposition system and analyzed its undeveloped characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 詳細描寫並分析了其後置詞不發達的特點。
